name: RobinSharmaQuotes
0:
”Alexa open Robin Sharma Quotes and inspire me.”
”Alexa open Robin Sharma Quotes and motivate me.”
”Alexa open Robin Sharma Quotes and Give me the quote of the day.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: robin sharma quotes
des:
Welcome to the Robin Sharma Quotes.

Robin Sharma is a Canadian writer and leadership speaker, best known for his The Monk Who Sold His Ferrari series.

This has collection of his few famous quotes. They will inspire you, motivate you to be the best you can be. 

You can inspire yourself daily by just asking:

"Alexa open Robin Sharma Quotes and inspire me."

"Alexa open Robin Sharma Quotes and give me the quote of the day."
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
